page.title: 14Nuclear Waste A Pupils View
page.content: Proposals have been made to dump nuclear waste at South Killingholme. This isnt very fair as there are industries near by and the surrounding area is fairly well populated. Killingholme already stores a lot of chemical waste. The matter should not be rested because if to many people ignore it then it could be dumped without our knowing. Also the secrecy with which this issue is being carried out scares a lot of people and is not fair. It is obvious that the people who propose to dump the waste are not thinking of future generations whose lifes will be in danger because of their stupidity. In June 1985 we wrote to the local paper expressing this view we hope that it will influence the right people.
